Description copied from interface: BindingFactory
Constructs a new Binding.

Specified by:
create in interface BindingFactory
Parameters:
metadata - The annotations of the field.
field - The field to bound to.
codec - The Codec to be used to decode instances of the type of object to be injected in the field.
context - The context for creating references.
containerReference - TODO
Returns:
A new Binding instance, capable of loading data from a BitBuffer into an object's field.
